products.title: Chromium Thermal Blackout Slate Roller Blind
products.description: Sleek, contemporary and radiating style, this chromium slate roller blind takes the idea of a modern window dressing to the next level. Not only is the deep grey shade chic and sleek, the perfect accompaniment to modern minimalist schemes, its a slimline and practical blind too.

products.title: Thermal Plus City Grey Energy Saving Roller Blind
products.description: This dark and dusky city grey blind has a sophisticated, contemporary look backed up by incredible energy saving properties giving you more bang for your buck. The stylish fabric is coated with a special thermal layer that insulates your home and gives your radiators a break, so this dark and dusky city grey blind has a sophisticated, contemporary look backed up by incredible energy saving properties giving you more bang for your buck.

products.title: Thermal Plus Misty Grey Energy Saving Roller Blind

products.title: Thermal Luxe Dimout Charcoal Roller Blind
products.description: Stark, striking and beautiful, the solid black shade of this thermal luxe charcoal roller blind is balanced by a lightness that comes from its soft, linen-mix fabric. products.title: Lexington Grey Thermal Pleated Free-hanging Blind
products.description: Their lexington collection of thermal perfect fit pleated blinds is both luxurious and practical. Featuring their thermal fabric technology - these blinds keep your home warm in the winter whilst still maintaining the sophisticated look of pleated blinds. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds their lexington collection is ideal because of the celluar technology - honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit the heat transfer from your windows.
